interactivity.requirements: You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Perfect Harmony "
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Choose to visit First Floor of the School Dorms , after going up to the Second Floor first.
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Fail to trigger the event. Replaced by Lost in the Red Room .

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.42.

secret_information.description:
